Template.SubjectPart: Thank You for Your Purchase of {{total_shares}} Shares!
Template.TextPart:
Hello {{user_name}},

Thank you for your recent purchase of {{total_shares}} shares on BeatStake. We are thrilled to have you as part of our community.

If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your trust in us!

Best regards,
The BeatStake Team
Template.HtmlPart:
Thank You for Your Purchase, {{user_name}}!

We are thrilled to have you as part of our community. Thank you for your recent purchase of {{total_shares}} shares for Total Amount : ${{total_price}}

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your trust in us!

Best regards,
BeatStake Team
